org.drombler.commons.context

Class ContextInjector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drombler.commons.context.ContextInjector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.softsmithy.lib.util.Injector<Object>

    public class ContextInjector
extends Object
implements org.softsmithy.lib.util.Injector<Object>
    The ContextInjector injects the active Context to Objects, which implement the ActiveContextSensitive interface and the application Context to Objects, which implement the ApplicationContextSensitive interface. TODO: Replace with CDI?
    Author:
    puce
